description: This file is the main entry point of a Flutter mobile application, defining the root widget and a stateful homepage with a centered message and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget for the application, sets up theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage handling the UI layout.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the application, calls runApp.
